entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 27. Humidex 29. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
